item.title: Gulliver's Traverls by Jonathan Swift
item.description: Gulliver’s travels was published anonimously in 1726, it consisted of four books, because Gulliver undertakes four voyages in the story. There is a book for each voyage. The protagonist belongs to the middle class. It is considered a travel book because Gulliver undertakes four differendt voyages, people liked stories about exotic places that were different from England. The name of the protagonist is Lemuel Gulliver, and the book cannot be forced into a single genre.
